comprehensive_overview: libX11 is the X Window System protocol client library which provides an interface to the X Window System core protocol and provides higher-level functions for building window systems on top of the X Window System core.
core_features: Implements the client side of the X Window System protocol
Provides higher-level functions for building window systems on top of the X Window System core
Supports window creation, management, and event handling
Enables communication with the X server for display and input management
